title: Chelsea news: John Terry shares gruesome video of injury – was Diego Costa to blame? | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 2:19 pm John Terry suffered an ankle injury in Chelsea training (Picture: Instagram/Getty) 
Chelsea captain John Terry uploaded a gruesome Instagram video of an injury he sustained in training ahead of the side’s clash with Burnley this weekend. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
It appears Terry has suffered a deep cut to his ankle and shared an eye-watering clip of him receiving stitches following the training ground incident on Friday. 
Interestingly, the 36-year-old shared two pictures of a challenge with Diego Costa immediately after the video in his Instagram story – was the big centre-forward to blame? 
Luckily for Antonio Conte, the Premier League leaders have no other injury concerns ahead of the trip to Turf Moor. John Terry shared pictures of a challenge with Diego Costa (Picture: Instagram) 
David Luiz, Gary Cahill and Cesar Azpilicueta are expected to keep their places in central defence for the Blues. 
Terry, who is out of contract at the end of the campaign, has only made nine appearances in all competitions for Chelsea so far this term.
